DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate overall pain relief single dose PF-04531083 placebo follow third molar extraction .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Of Pf-04531083 In Treating Post-Surgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: Oral surgical procedure remove 2 third molar ( unilateral ) . Predose pain intensity score ( 100 mm Visual Analog Scale [ VAS ] ) > 50 mm within 5 hour oral surgery . Predose pain intensity score moderate within 5 hour oral surgery . Presence history significant hepatic , renal , endocrine , cardiovascular , neurological ( include subject history frequent moderate severe headache subject episodic migraine twice per month ) , psychiatric , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , hematologic , metabolic disorder . Prior use type analgesic NSAID within five halflives drug less take first dose study medication , except anesthesia procedure . Recent history chronic analgesic tranquilizer dependency . Active dental infection time surgery . Any significant oral surgery complication time surgery immediate postoperative period dental surgery last > 30 minute . Subjects smoker .
